# ABPeoplePickerSelectionBehavior

**Structure**

Constants indicating the possible value selection behaviors.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ABPeoplePickerSelectionBehavior
```

## Overview

These constants are of the type [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/ABPeoplePickerSelectionBehavior] and are used by [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/ABPeoplePickerView/valueSelectionBehavior].

## Selection Behaviors

- **ABNoValueSelection**: The user cannot select individual values.
- **ABSingleValueSelection**: The user can select a single value.
- **ABMultipleValueSelection**: The user can select multiple values.

## Initializers

- **init(_:)**: Initializes a constant from an integer value that represents a picker selection behavior.
- **init(rawValue:)**: Initializes a constant from a raw value that represents a picker selection behavior.

## Instance Properties

- **rawValue**: The raw integer value of a possible selection behavior constant.

## Specifying Selection Behavior

- **valueSelectionBehavior**: The current selection behavior.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
